tit.j: 甲賀ファミリーランド

sen.j: 甲賀ファミリーランド（こうがファミリーランド）は、かつて滋賀県甲賀郡甲西町 (滋賀県)（現在は湖南市）にあった遊園地である。
sen.e: Koga Family Land was an amusement park located in the former Kosei-cho, Koka-gun, Shiga Prefecture (present day Konan City in Shiga Prefecture).
Koga Family Land was an amusement park located in the former Kosei-cho, Koka-gun, Shiga Prefecture (present day Konan City in Shiga Prefecture).
Koga Family Land was an amusement park located in the former Kosei-cho, Koka-gun, Shiga Prefecture (present day Konan City in Shiga Prefecture).

sen.j: 敷地は甲賀カントリー倶楽部が所有しており、同ゴルフ場に隣接していた。
sen.e: The property it was located on is owned by Koga Conutry Club, and the facility was adjacent to the golf course of the same name.
The property it was located on is owned by Koga Conutry Club, and the facility was adjacent to the golf course of the same name.
The site it was located on is owned by Koga Conutry Club, and the facility was adjacent to the golf course of the same name.

sen.j: 観覧車とメリーゴーラウンド、忍者屋敷などからなり、開業当時は滋賀県最大の遊園地として県内外からの客でにぎわった。
sen.e: The park included a ferris wheel, a merry-go-round, a Ninja house and the like, and at the time it opened was the largest amusement park in Shiga Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: The park included a ferris wheel, a merry-go-round, a Ninja house and the like, and at the time it opened was the largest amusement park in Shiga Prefecture.

The park included a ferris wheel, a merry-go-round, a Ninja house and the like, and at the time it opened, it attracted visitors from Shiga Prefecture and other prefectures as the largest amusement park in the prefecture.

sen.j: しかし、山奥にある遊園地で交通の便は悪く、業績の悪化によって1985年に閉鎖された。
sen.e: Although it was enjoyed by visitors from both Shiga Prefecture and elswhere, declining business results due to poor availability of public transportation to the mountainous area in which it was located resulted in the park closing down in 1985.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Although it was enjoyed by visitors from both Shiga Prefecture and elswhere, declining business results due to poor availability of public transportation to the mountainous area in which it was located resulted in the park closing down in 1985.
However, declining business results due to poor availability of public transportation to the mountainous area in which it was located resulted in the park closing down in 1985.

sen.j: 遊具などはそのまま残されていたが、2000年代以降の廃墟ブームによって若者らなどに無許可で立ち入られる事態が後を絶たず、所有者が危険であると判断、2008年9月末までに遊具を全て撤去した。
sen.e: The rides and other amusements were left in place as they were; however, with the rising number of such abandoned facilities from the year 2000, there was an unstoppable tide of young people and the like entering the park without permission, whereupon the owners decided the park posed a hazard, and removed all the rides and amusement facilities.

The rides and other amusements were left in place as they were; however, with the rising number of such abandoned facilities from the year 2000, there was an unstoppable tide of young people and the like entering the park without permission, whereupon the owners decided the park posed a hazard, and removed all the rides and amusement facilities.

The rides and other amusements were left in place as they were; however, with the rising number of such abandoned facilities from the year 2000, there was an unstoppable tide of young people and the like entering the park without permission, whereupon the owners decided the park posed a hazard, and removed all the rides and amusement facilities.

sen.j: 現在では一部の廃墟化した建物が残るのみである。
sen.e: At present, only a portion of the buildings, now in ruin, remain on the grounds.
At present, only a portion of the buildings, now in ruin, remain on the grounds.
At present, only a portion of the buildings, now in ruin, remain on the grounds.

sen.j: フィールドアスレチック
